title: How the hell did Riot manage to fuck this game up for 2 seasons?
body:
its going to be 3 soon
Every new champion they release just fucks the game even harder than the last.  
Then this bitch  {{champion:84}} who is very problematic is starting to get played more cause of the conqueror changes. ( knew it was going to be busted on mages)  I like the fact it changed because it was too anti-tank despite tank play rates are still low as fuck. 
Dragon soul =  just ff
Elder= just in case they didn't ff 
Omnistone is pretty much the embodiment of riot 
 {{item:3181}} just fucking stupid

But hey at least we have 12 skins coming up this December... 




This is just going to be another season of snowball and game decided before 15min.
